name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Advance font finder from any website

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Have you ever visited a website and wondered what the font is? Advanced Font Finder assists in identifying fonts in a snap.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Have you ever come across a striking font on a website and wondered what it was? Say goodbye to the guessing game with the Advance Font Finder for Any Website extension. This tool empowers web developers, graphic designers, and font aficionados to effortlessly identify the fonts used on any webpage, diving deep into details like family, size, style, and color. Instant Font Recognition instantly displays the font details. You can get a full breakdown including font family, size, style, and color to help you understand and use the font effectively in your own projects. With a single click, you can copy all the details of your favorite fonts and paste them wherever you wish, facilitating quick use. You can initiate the extension with a simple click on the toolbar icon and exit just as easily when youâ€™re done. Unleash the full potential of the Advance Font Finder for Any Website at no cost, with no hidden premium tiers. With Advance Font Finder for Any Website, discovering the world of fonts becomes a breeze. Get ready to explore, identify, and utilize the perfect fonts for your creative endeavors. Transform your projects with the right fonts now easily identifiable and accessible at your fingertips!



How to setup and use Advance font finder from any website :-

Step 1: Open the Chrome Web Store
Step 2: Open manage extension and click on Chrome Web Store
Step 3: Search for "Advance Font Finder Appwrk"
Step 4: Click on Advance Font Finder from Website and hit the Add to Chrome button.
Step 5: Click on Manage Extension icon and Pin the Extension in the Chrome toolbar
Step 6: Click on the Advance Font Finder From Any Website Extension Icon
Step 7: Hover over the desired area of the web page from where you want to fetch the font details and click on it to find details about the font including font family, font-size, line-height, font color, etc.

Note: If you remove the extension and reinstall it again, you would need to refresh the page to use the extension in case you didn't close the browser after deleting the extension.
